attributes.action: Make St Georges Day an English Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: As A Christian Country, we should have the opportunity to celebrate our Christian heritage with having an English Bank Holiday as it us a big part of our English history.
attributes.background: To Take a vote regarding making St George's Day an English Bank Holiday.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Make bank holidays for St George's Day in England and St David's Day in Wales
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654089
